snippet: Francine Prose discusses "At Last" by Edward St. Aubyn, the last in a remarkable series of novels starring the self-destructive Patrick Melrose.
abstract: Francine Prose discusses "At Last" by Edward St. Aubyn, the last in a remarkable series of novels starring the self-destructive Patrick Melrose.

headline.main: Book Review Podcast: Edward St. Aubyn Ends a Series With 'At Last'
